name: A Genocider #1927
description:
Every government is painstakingly to build a false consciousness of imaginary enemy for a specific group (Generally the people in a nation.) , and persuade, brainwash this specific group to detest imaginary enemy.

Once they complete monopoly on violence, they have justified reason to force a group of innocent people (Generally male military.) massacre another group of innocent people.


“ Warfare or conflict not only let government and arms dealer have huge common profit, also eliminate main rebel noise in the society (Generally prime-age males.) .

Even turn me into a hero, why shouldn’t I start a war? ”
